name: SonarQubeEnvInject
description: Prepare SonarQube or SonarCloud analysis configuration, to be used in later steps (Maven, Gradle or Ant)
author: sonarsource

inputs.name: endpointType
inputs.label: Server Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use SonarCloud or SonarQube endpoint connection.

inputs.name: SonarCloud
inputs.label: SonarCloud Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the SonarCloud endpoint for your project. To create one, click the Manage link and create a new SonarCloud Service Endpoint, enter your organization and token.

inputs.name: organization
inputs.label: Organization
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of your Organization

inputs.name: SonarQube
inputs.label: SonarQube Server Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SonarQube Server Endpoint. To create one, click the Manage link and create a new SonarQube Server Endpoint, enter your server url and token.

inputs.name: projectKey
inputs.label: Project Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SonarQube project unique key, i.e. `sonar.projectKey`. Keep blank to use default value generated by the scanner based on your project.

inputs.name: projectName
inputs.label: Project Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SonarQube project name, i.e. `sonar.projectName`. Keep blank to use default value generated by the scanner based on your project.

inputs.name: projectVersion
inputs.label: Project Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SonarQube project version, i.e. `sonar.projectVersion`. Keep blank to use default value generated by the scanner based on your project.

inputs.name: extraProperties
inputs.label: Additional Properties
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional properties to be passed to the scanner. Specify each key=value pair on a new line.
